CSSImportRule.summary: The CSSImportRule interface represents an @import at-rule.

remarks.para:
The resolved URL will be the href attribute of the
associated stylesheet.

CSSImportRuleLayerName.summary: The read-only layerName property of the interface returns the name of the cascade layer created by the {{cssxref("@import")}} at-rule.

remarks.para:
If the created layer is anonymous, the string is empty (""), if no layer has been
created, it is the null object.

CSSImportRuleLayerName.value: A string, that can be empty, or the null object.

CSSImportRuleMedia.summary: The read-only media property of the interface returns a object representing the media query list of the {{cssxref("@import")}} rule.
CSSImportRuleMedia.value: A object.Although the media property itself is read-only in the sense that you can't replace the MediaList object, you can still assign to the media property directly, which is equivalent to assigning to its property. You can also modify the MediaList object using the and methods.

CSSImportRuleStyleSheet.summary:
The read-only styleSheet property of the
interface returns the CSS Stylesheet specified by the
@import at-rule. This will be
in the form of a object.

remarks.para:
An @import at-rule always has
an associated stylesheet.

CSSImportRuleSupportsText.summary: The read-only supportsText property of the interface returns the supports condition specified by the {{cssxref("@import")}} at-rule.
